post.body: me2day? I looked at it and signed up for it actually. I don't really like it as much as twitter though
@zizukabi ^^ 새해 복많이 받으세요 왜 한국에서 twitter가 인기없어요?
만나서 반갑습니다 이재 한국어로 가끔 tweet해불꺼예요~ ^^
In my case it's way better than any of the fancy drugs I've tried. But people always think it sounds weird. :-)
For me it's the only thing that works. I went a couple years of no caffeine except for the rare occasion of a migraine
started @ 125kgs. Got down to 106 in 9 months or so. Currently around 103. Goal is 100. Eventually want to hit 90.
I lost about half the weight in the first few months. The rest took about 6 months. Things have been slow the last 6 months
I lost 40 lbs following it fairly closely. I haven't been to strict about it the last 6 months or so, but it hasn't come back
your chili recipe is awesome. Made it twice now with 미친소
Anyone have any guesses y twttr's not popular in Korea? I just discovered that Tweet Deck doesn't do Hangul. mayB that's a strt. @cburell?
Flurry of activity at work 2day as the new hagwon opens. Hopefully I cn hide in the corner & finish up old work before new stuff piles on
About to try and sleep again after looking into Sambo a bit. Might just continue Judo training when the thumb heals up.
Great read!: RT @guykawasaki: How hangovers work http://adjix.com/i7x3
I never use MySpace anymore. I find it so annoying that they email me birthday reminders but won't tell me whose birthday unless I log in.
Massive dose of caffeine I took for the migraine (http://bit.ly/mjce) worked but is predictably keeping me awake. Shoulda taken it sooner
Nursing sudden migraine. It's been a while since one of these. I blame my crap holiday diet
Slept like a rock last night. I think I've been gradually sleep-depriving myself 1-2 hours at a time during the week.
Apartment hunt is ongoing...
Just can't get enuf of this chili
Slept in late. Good day ahead.
